title: BRIEF-SNC-Lavalin Selected For Up To $20 Million U.S. Georgia Department Of Transportation Contract For Safety Design Services
text:
BRIEF-SNC-Lavalin Selected For Up To $20 Million U.S. Georgia Department Of Transportation Contract For Safety Design Services

Stock Markets 22 minutes ago (Oct 09, 2019 08:31)

© Reuters. BRIEF-SNC-Lavalin Selected For Up To $20 Million U.S. Georgia Department Of Transportation Contract For Safety Design Services Oct 9 (Reuters) - SNC-Lavalin Group Inc : * SNC-LAVALIN SELECTED FOR UP TO $20 MILLION US GEORGIA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION CONTRACT FOR SAFETY DESIGN SERVICES * SNC-LAVALIN GROUP INC - SELECTED AS PRIME CONSULTANT UNDER AN UP TO $20 MILLION, A THREE-YEAR CONTRACT WITH TWO ONE-YEAR OPTIONAL EXTENSIONS
